Legal_Issue: Reasonableness of RPD decision, availability of state protection
Application_Facts: Ms. Myle provided credible evidence of domestic violence and lack of state protection in St. Vincent; RPD dismissed claim twice based on lack of subjective fear and presumed state protection
Decision_Outcome: Judicial review granted; case referred back for redetermination
Remedy_Requested: Redetermination of refugee claim with consideration of updated evidence
Court_Ruling: RPD decision unreasonable due to reliance on outdated or incomplete information
Claimant_Status: Refugee claimant fearing persecution due to domestic violence
Defendant_Behavior: RPD failed to address contradictory evidence and recent country conditions
Grounds_for_Claim: Fear of persecution from domestic violence without adequate state protection
Assessment_Factor: Credibility of applicant, effectiveness of police and shelters in St. Vincent
Procedural_Issue: Two dismissals by RPD followed by judicial review applications
Evidence_Used: Applicant testimony, updated country condition reports
Application_Basis: Domestic violence as grounds for refugee protection
Evidence_Assessed: Outdated RPD reliance on country information, lack of current data on shelter operations and police response
Governing_Rule: Panels must consider all relevant evidence including updated country conditions and testimonies
Evidentiary_Deficiency: RPD failed to consider recent developments and contradictory evidence
Outcome: Case remitted to new RPD panel for reassessment
Harm_Assessment: Risk of harm from domestic violence without state protection
Cause_Description: Ms. Myle claimed refugee status due to fear of persecution from domestic violence without adequate state protection in St. Vincent
Evidence_Handling: RPD did not adequately address or assess updated evidence
Evidence_Issues: Use of outdated information, failure to reconcile conflicting evidence
Evidence_Assessment: Insufficient assessment of state protection mechanisms in St. Vincent
Decision_Rationale: Decision unreasonable due to incomplete analysis of state protection availability
Evidentiary_Issues: Failure to consider updated country conditions and applicant credibility
